import anvil.server
from datetime import datetime

@anvil.server.callable
def place_booking(name, address, quantity):
    # In a real application, you would save this to a Data Table
    # e.g. app_tables.bookings.add_row(name=name, address=address, quantity=quantity, date=datetime.now())
    print(f"New Order: {quantity} for {name} at {address}")
    return f"Booking Confirmed: {quantity} white truck dispatched to {address}."
